profile.name: Tobiloba Awolaju
profile.title: Robotics Research Engineer | Perception, Control & Learning Systems
profile.bio:
Electrical & Electronics Engineering student @ Adeleke University focused on robotics research, perception, and & real-time systems.

I design and build robotic systems end-to-end—mechanics, control, sensing, and learning—with an emphasis on high-DOF robots, SLAM, and constrained embedded platforms.

Currently architecting a full-scale humanoid robot and developing custom control and planning algorithms in ROS 2. My work spans C++, Python, real-time control, embedded systems, and experimental learning-based approaches for perception and mapping.

I’m particularly interested in robotics at the intersection of control theory, state estimation, and learning.
